title: Game Freezing When Re-rolling for permanent champion
body:
Currently my league client has frozen when I re-roll for a permanent champion.
I would consider this just bad luck, but it just happened to a friend I was playing with as well. I don't mind losing the champ shards. But that is a bummer. Since I want to fill my whole champion pool up. Lol

 Here is a screenshot: 
http://imgur.com/LtRG6Ey

replies.body: Well I followed the guide and repaired the game files, but I still don't have my Illaoi in my hextech crafting page at all. Any way to get her back? I would actually really like to use that champion and that would suck if I have to buy her now.

Porocles mentioned that your crafting went through and resulted in an Illaoi permanent and your connection to our servers went through, but the animation seems to have crashed the client.

You should now own Illaoi. Check your Profile > Champions tab.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FusQOagI,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-07-20T01:28:21.115+0000)
>
> Porocles mentioned that your crafting went through and resulted in an Illaoi permanent and your connection to our servers went through, but the animation seems to have crashed the client.
> 
> You should now own Illaoi. Check your Profile > Champions tab.

Ah, yes I am {{champion:64}} . -.-
Thank you very much. You two have both been very helpful! A+ {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Welcomed! Have a Splash on the Fields of Justice!!

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m7alwxVDQQ4/VXsRUvD21VI/AAAAAAAArXs/xz9GF6oweYY/s1600/pool_party_201_splash_1920.jpg

It would certainly be a bummer to lose crafting matierals due to this, so I took a look to find out what happened.  I'm happy to say that your crafting went through and resulted in an Illaoi permanent.  Your connection to our servers went through, but the animation seems to have crashed the client.  This may be due to an issue with game files trying to render hextech crafting, and [running a repair ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) per our game crash guide might fix this.  Hopefully that helps clear things up, but please let me know if you have any questions.

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.
